talentExchangePage.title: Talent Exchange
talentExchangePage.description: Find agricultural experts, specialized labor, and professional services.
talentExchangePage.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search filters to find the talent you need.

error.title: Search Error
error.description: Failed to fetch services. Please try again.

noItemsFound.title: No items found.
noItemsFound.hint: Try adjusting your filters or search terms.

AppFooter.tagline: Connecting the entire agricultural value chain, from seed to table.

hero.title: Empowering Agriculture, Together.
hero.subtitle: Join DamDoh, the global platform connecting every link in the agricultural supply chain. From farmers to consumers, we foster growth, sustainability, and direct trade.

features.title: A Unified Platform for All Stakeholders
features.subtitle: DamDoh provides the tools and network you need to thrive in the modern agricultural ecosystem.

networking.title: Smart Networking
networking.description: AI-powered matchmaking to connect you with the right partners, from suppliers to international buyers.

marketplace.title: Direct Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell produce, inputs, and equipment directly, cutting out middlemen and increasing transparency.

forums.title: Knowledge Forums
forums.description: Share insights, ask questions, and learn from a global community of agricultural experts and peers.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Offer your professional services or find skilled agricultural talent for your specific needs.

forWho.badge: For Everyone in the Value Chain
forWho.title: Built for the Entire Agricultural World
forWho.description: Whether you're planting seeds or setting a table, DamDoh is your platform for connection and growth.

farmers.title: Farmers & Producers
farmers.description: Access new markets, get fair prices, find sustainable inputs, and manage your farm operations efficiently.

buyers.title: Buyers & Processors
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable produce directly from producers and manage your supply chain with confidence.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your expertise, find new clients, and contribute to a more efficient and sustainable agricultural sector.

forWho.imageAlt: A collage of diverse people working in agriculture

cta.title: Ready to Grow Your Agricultural Future?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of stakeholders who are already building a more connected and sustainable food system.
